mapper.select: SELECT activity.`club_activity_id` AS `activity_id`, activity.`name` AS `activity_name`, activity.`attribution`, activity.`poster_url`, activity.`address`, activity.`allow_apply`, activity.`allow_pre_apply`, activity.`apply_deadline`, activity.`hold_date`, activity.`hold_deadline`, activity.`is_del`, club.`club_id`, club.`name` AS `club_name`, COUNT(comment.`comment_id`) AS `comment_count` FROM `t_club_activity` activity, `t_club` club, `t_comment` comment WHERE activity.`club_id` = club.`club_id` AND comment.`source_type` = 1 AND comment.`source_id` = activity.`club_activity_id` AND activity.`club_id` = #{clubId}
